short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use mouse gesture to trigger browser command.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is my own implementation of mouse gesture in Google Chrome.
There is other extension that has the same features but most of them is closed source and has mechanism that send telemetry data back to their server. 
This extension will greatly improved your browsing experience inside browser. 
Install it and you be able to trigger New Tab, Close Tab, Back, Forward and Undo Close Tab by just triggering simple up, down, left, right or combination of it.

Best part of this extension is it's open source and you can download them and do anything with it you like here https://github.com/laiseng/chrogesture-extension

If you like this extension give STAR me in github or contribute back to the community there. I'm accepting any suggestion to improve it and you may also submit PR for it.


Thanx and enjoy :)
